entry.title: Epicurus
entry.subtitle: 341 - 270 BCE
entry.short: Epicurus was an ancient Greek philosopher and sage who founded Epicureanism, a highly influential school of philosophy.
entry.name: epicurus
entry.content: Epicurus was an ancient Greek philosopher and sage who founded Epicureanism, a highly influential school of philosophy.
